name: Plant Rescuer
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 46 GameJam in 72 hours using Unity.

Link to Ludum Dare entry

You are a happy-go-lucky space alien trying to keep those fickle terrestrial plants alive on a hazardous planet.
Water your plant, not too little but also not too much. Oh, and watch out for meteors.

No real win condition, just keep your little plant alive as long as you can.
